section.title: In-line style
section.description: Specifies style attributes that override the settings inherited from the style sheet. Click to define the In-line style. Refer to the Style Editor for details.

section.title: Orientation
section.description: The orientation of the label. The choices are: "Horizontal" and "Vertical"

section.title: Column flow
section.description: Specify how the choices are organized. LRTB - left-to-right, then top-to-bottom. TBLR - top-to-bottom, then left-to-right Choices include.

section.title: Column count
section.description: Specify how many columns should be used to display the radiobutton choices.

section.title: Row count
section.description: Specify how many rows should be used to display the radiobutton choices.

section.title: Maximum choices
section.description: Specify the maximum number of choices to show. Set to 0 to show all choices.
